tool_description: This API will help you with several networking-related utilities.
name: Networking
title: Networking

api_list.name: WhatsMyIP
api_list.description: This will fetch your public IP.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://networking.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "networking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://networking.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "networking.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
